text: tamange satyaya givisum kada kara, (apage) dutayava (ratin) pitamam kirimata adahas kara, utsaha kala janatava samaga oba yuddha kala yutu noveda? ovunma (mevÃ¦ni napura) oba veta palamuvenma arambha kalaha. ovunta oba biya vannehuda?
